import React from 'react' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { cart } from '../reducers/cart' export const CartItem = ({ product }) => { const dispatch = useDispatch() return (
x{product.quantity}
{product.emoji}
{product.price * product.quantity}:-
) }
